response.overview: On the eve of the Ching Ming Festival, Weihong, a lonely old man living alone in rural Chaoshan, discovers something strange about himself; one of his eyes can see his dead relatives. As the worship ceremony begins, Weihong even sees his dead relatives meeting up with relatives in other cities far away. He sees this sign as a revelation and prays to the Chaoshan Fairy in the temple for blessings that his daughter-in-law, who is pregnant, will have a safe delivery.
response.title: Gone people
